properties.entry: SELECT DISTINCT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, NVL(COUNT(*), 0) COMMENT_COUNT, MEMBER_NM, B.CREATE_DT, READ_COUNT FROM BOARD B LEFT JOIN MEMBER M ON (M.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) FULL JOIN "COMMENT" C USING(BOARD_NO) GROUP BY BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, MEMBER_NM, B.CREATE_DT, READ_COUNT ORDER BY B.CREATE_DT DESC
SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NM, CREATE_DT, READ_COUNT FROM BOARD LEFT JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? ORDER BY CREATE_DT
